alert.note: Alert for Bell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 12:36AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bell County through 115 AM CDT... At 1236 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stillhouse Hollow Lake, or near Harker Heights, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Killeen, Temple, Copperas Cove, Harker Heights, Belton, Fort Hood, Nolanville, Morgan`s Point Resort, Bartlett, Salado, Little River-Academy, Troy, Rogers, Holland, Belton Lake, Stillhouse Hollow Lake, Sparks, Union Grove, Ding Dong and White Hall. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 278 and 313. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
